name: Moonshot Strategies
goal: Moonshot Strategies is an advisory firm working with technology companies and venture capital firms, advising leaders and investors on devising public policy and communications strategies, structures and teams to ensure their innovation succeeds, no matter how challenging the environment.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: Technology-related issues primarliy: data flow, data protection, digital content, telecommunications, consumer protection, etc.
